```{r datasets}
#events in US from 1980 - 2024
events_data <- read.csv("events-US-1980-2024-Q4.csv")
events_data <- na.omit(events_data)
events_data <- events_data[-c(1, 2), ]

#insurance data
insurance_data <- read.csv("all_insurance_costs.csv")
insurance_data <- na.omit(insurance_data)

#property insurance cost data
prop_insurance <- read.csv("property_insurance_costs.csv")
prop_insurance <- na.omit(prop_insurance)
```


```{r}
colnames(events_data) <- c("Name_Date", #chr
                           "Disaster_Type", #chr
                           "Begin_Date", #num -> chr (date format)
                           "End_Date", #num -> chr (date format)
                          "CPI_Adjusted_Cost_Millions", #chr
                          "Unadjusted_Cost_Millions", #chr
                          "Deaths") # chr

events_data$Begin_Date <- as.Date(as.character(events_data$Begin_Date),  #convert num -> chr
                          format = "%Y%m%d")

events_data$End_Date <- as.Date(as.character(events_data$End_Date), 
                        format = "%Y%m%d")

head(events_data)
dim(events_data)
```


```{r}
colnames(insurance_data) <- c("PPI_Series_ID",
```
